name: Mass Suggestion
description: Enemy units within 2 tiles have a 25% chance to skip their turn. Gain +1 Science for each affected unit.

name: Mind Control
description: 100% chance to convert adjacent enemy units to your side, regardless of health.

name: Suggestion
description: Reduces adjacent enemy unit combat strength by 50%.

name: Hypnotic Aura
description: Enemy units within 3 tiles of the city suffer a -50% combat penalty.
